messages.title: Working in the public sector I see first hand how services across the country have been damaged by years of austerity. It is time for a change. I am determined to stand up for all people in this area and fight to improve the services we all rely on

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Investing for a better Sittingbourne & Sheppey
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will give our NHS an extra £2 billion a year, ensuring 5000 more health visitors and school nurses, building new schools, and ensuring facilities for the community.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Our NHS is at breaking point
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Locally people in Sittingbourne & Sheppey are finding it much harder to see GPs and the care they need. The Labour party has the biggest commitment to our NHS.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Homelessness is rising in Sittingbourne & Sheppey
keyPolicies.policyDescription: More job opportunities in Sittingbourne and Sheppey, real living wage of £10.00 an hour and all workers getting full rights from day one.

issues.health: Locally people in Sittingbourne & Sheppey are finding it much harder to see GPs and the care they need. The Labour party has the biggest commitment to our NHS.

community.content: More job opportunities in Sittingbourne and Sheppey, real living wage of £10.00 an hour and all workers getting full rights from day one.

endorsements.endorsement: As local councillors in Sittingbourne we fully welcome Mike Rolfe as Labour candidate. Working in the public sector he has the knowledge to understand the issues that the people of Sittingbourne and Sheppey have, a commitment to improvement, new ideas and a fresh start.

examples: More job opportunities in Sittingbourne and Sheppey, real living wage of £10.00 an hour and all workers getting full rights from day one.
Locally people in Sittingbourne & Sheppey are finding it much harder to see GPs and the care they need. The Labour party has the biggest commitment to our NHS.

As local councillors in Sittingbourne we fully welcome Mike Rolfe as Labour candidate. Working in the public sector he has the knowledge to understand the issues that the people of Sittingbourne and Sheppey have, a commitment to improvement, new ideas and a fresh start.
More job opportunities in Sittingbourne and Sheppey, real living wage of £10.00 an hour and all workers getting full rights from day one.
Locally people in Sittingbourne & Sheppey are finding it much harder to see GPs and the care they need. The Labour party has the biggest commitment to our NHS.

As local councillors in Sittingbourne we fully welcome Mike Rolfe as Labour candidate. Working in the public sector he has the knowledge to understand the issues that the people of Sittingbourne and Sheppey have, a commitment to improvement, new ideas and a fresh start.
